attributes.action: make all housing energy efficent and designed to have the least environmental impact pssible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we need all housing to have plenty of parkland, patches of woodland, coutryside close by and with plenty of trees amongst housing to encourage wildlife to share our living space and thrive

we also need all housing to be energy efficent getting power from renewable energy such as wind, solar as a lot of the uks carbon emissions come from housing

i ask you to please sign this petition so that the goverment can take action, thanks.
